results.title: Spam - solutions anyone?
results.shortDescription: Spam (unsolicited bulk email) is now a real problem for many organisations. This article will help you choose a solution for your organisation.
results.longDescription: Spam (unsolicited bulk email) is now a real problem for many organisations.his article looks in more depth at how the various solutions on offer work and provides some guidance on issues to consider when choosing a solution for your organisation.

results.title: Delete an email contact or an address book
results.shortDescription: This is a training video to help you delete a contact or addressbook in CTT Mail.
results.longDescription: This is a training video to help you delete a contact or addressbook in CTT Mail.

results.title: Changing Font Colours in Email
results.shortDescription: This is a training video to help you change the font colours used in CTT Mail.
results.longDescription: This is a training video to help you change the font colours used in CTT Mail.
